Text: I don't know if CBSRMT will see this, but THANK YOU, THANK YOU, THANK YOU!!!  This is a treasure.  I remember sitting up when I should have been in bed listening to E.G. Marshal and that squeaky door!  This is beyond anything anyone has ever done on TPB!  Thanks again.
Thank so very much for these wonderful shows. Lot's of hard work went into uploading these.

These are so great and your collection is so complete.  Is there any way that you could put all 1400 in one torrent that I could let go for 4 months?

ThanksATON!!!
